author: cms-sw
body:
backport of #9487 
plus the extra commits https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/commit/720bf837a6cc11adc9afef270b823aacb8a07ee7

This allows SCRAM to select dedicated bin and pythonpath for externals which are build for multiple archs.
This also drop py2 support for scram tools files
title: Fix symlinks for PATH and PYTHONPATH
